class_notes: Permission is of the instructor is required for enrollment. For permission, please e-mail Dr. Edwards at Edwards@emory.edu.
course_description: Focus on discussion of current theory and research about attraction, attachment, love and related phenomena. Includes investigation of romantic and companionate forms of love as they are conceptualized and studied by social scientists across adult development.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:15am in New Psyc Bldg 493 (36 Eagle Ro
